Text.Page:
Larusia swears that howling ghosts are keeping her awake. But I keep telling her: it's the wolves!

Prove I'm right—and let me sleep—by killing the {@LinkCreature:4#1041#ashstalker wolves} out there!

It's quiet. Almost...too quiet.

But not too quiet for a nap, once this shift ends.

Thanks, . And I'll be thanking you in my dreams!
